SELECT dv.time, t.time_format, t.time_full, t.categories_time, dv.${reading_field} FROM ${item.datatablename} dv JOIN ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m/%d/%Y %H:00') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%h:00 %p') AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m/%d/%Y %H:00') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m-%d-%Y %H:00') AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m-%d') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m/%d/%Y') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m-%d-%Y') AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m-%d') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m/%d/%Y') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%d. %b') AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%b. %Y') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%b, %Y') AS categories_time,
DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00') AS time_format, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%m/%d/%Y %H:00') AS time_full, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(dv.time, 'UTC', #{timezone_value}), '%H:00') AS categories_time,
${aggregate_function}(dv.time) AS time FROM ${item.datatablename} dv WHERE dv.time BETWEEN CONVERT_TZ(#{start_date}, #{timezone_value}, 'UTC') AND CONVERT_TZ(DATE_ADD(#{end_date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), #{timezone_value}, 'UTC') GROUP BY time_format ) t ON t.time = dv.time
